text: @aravosis @votevets Our men & women in uniform deserve better. They should not be unnecessarily forced to gather & be exposed to COVID-19 infection nor should they have to endure the presence of the ultimate cowardly chicken, cadet bone spurs, who has never sacrificed anything for anyone- disgusting
